greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of the sequence whose Dirichlet convolution with itself yields A064664, the inverse permutation of EKG-sequence.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to EKG sequence
formula: a(n) = numerator of f(n), where f(1) = 1, f(n) = (1/2) * (A064664(n) - Sum_{d|n, d>1, d<n} f(d) * f(n/d)) for n > 1.
program: v064413 = readvec("b064413_upto65539_terms_only.txt"); \\ From b-file of A064413 prepared beforehand.
DirSqrt(v) = {my(n=#v, u=vector(n)); u[1]=1; for(n=2, n, u[n]=(v[n]/v[1] - sumdiv(n, d, if(d>1&&d<n, u[d]*u[n/d], 0)))/2); u}; \\ From A317937.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 01 2018
